Scripts.OnEvent: if (thisaddonwork or (thisaddonwork==false and event=="ADDON_LOADED")) and pstemporarystop==nil then PhoenixStyle_OnEvent(self,event,...) end
Scripts.OnUpdate: if thisaddonwork and pstemporarystop==nil then PSF_OnUpdate() end

Scripts.OnClick: if pstrackbadsummons==1 then pstrackbadsummons=0 else pstrackbadsummons=1 end
if psautoinvsave[1]==1 then psautoinvsave[1]=0 else psautoinvsave[1]=1 end
if psautoinvsave[2]==1 then psautoinvsave[2]=0 else psautoinvsave[2]=1 end
if psautoinvsave[3]==1 then psautoinvsave[3]=0 else psautoinvsave[3]=1 end
if psautoinvsave[4]==1 then psautoinvsave[4]=0 else psautoinvsave[4]=1 end
if psautoinvsave[9]==1 then psautoinvsave[9]=0 else psautoinvsave[9]=1 end
if rscversion and rscversion>1.2501 then rscwhousedhsreport() else print("Update your RaidSlackCheck addon!") end
if rscversion and rscversion>1.2501 then rscwhousedhsreport2() else print("Update your RaidSlackCheck addon!") end
